Our team will design and build this compliance system with highly reliable and secure requirements, which will be used by all engineers in M365 to meet all privacy commitments.Successful candidates will become experts on big data performance, and will share best practices with thousands of M365 engineers all over the world. There will be many opportunities to show your passion, your talents in big data, improve the efficiency & reliability of the systems, pursue engineering excellence and make tremendous impact!Qualifications：• BS or MS degree in Computer Science or related field• 0-5 years of experience on design/development with C#/SQL Server/ASPX/JavaScript/Azure• Quick learning and solid problem solving, design, coding, and debugging skills• Communication in English: reading, writing, listening and speaking• Cross-team collaboration skills• Accountable and proactive• Optimization mindsets and skills/experience is a plus• Experience with distributed system is a plus

In this team, we will not only work on machine learning projects, but also online services and frontend experiences. Therefore, the developers in WpA team can experience a complete ship cycle for a commercial product.Data ScientistResponsibilityYou will be responsible to execute on the team’s Machine learning efforts as we aim to extract intelligence from user interactions and contents in a compliant boundary.·       You will go deep on a range of tasks including data mining, data annotation, and language processing.·       You will help establish and implement data pipelines.·       You will have ample opportunity for cross group collaboration, technical product definition and applied research.·       You enjoy being part of a collaborative, multidisciplinary team.·       You will mentor graduate student interns.·       You bring curiosity, a strong entrepreneurial spirit, and passion to deliver on the promise of technology in a difficult, competitive, and exciting vertical. QUALIFICATIONS: BS, MS or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics or related field3+ years working on production ML data pipelines2+ years of one or more of: named entity recognition, topic classification, knowledge graphs.Fluency with recent NLP & ML advancements, e.g., bert, attention, LSTMs, etc.Strong coding skills in one or more of Python, C/C++, Java, Scala, C# PREFERRED: 1+ years with one or more of: NLTK, Stanford CoreNLP, spaCy, etc.3+ years with one or more of: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, CNTK, etc.3+ years with one or more of: Spark, HDInsight, Hadoop, MapReduce, etc.Participation in Kaggle or similar competitionsWillingness to be a “learn-it-all” and jump into any problem space
